content.raw:
This is not satisfactory at the moment because [this bug](https://gitlab.com/python-devs/importlib_metadata/issues/43) in importlib\_metadata means it does not work with all packages. I don’t think I will change anything about how this PRw works - there is basicaly no other way to do this, so the bug in importlib\_metadata would need to be fixed if we want to check versions without importing modules.

At the moment none of the packages we use have this issue, but still. Maybe I will fix the bug in importlib\_metadata \(which is included in anaconda and en-route to being a standard library module in Python 3.8\). In any case let’s not merge this yet.

Edit: [pull request](https://gitlab.com/python-devs/importlib_metadata/merge_requests/38) submitted to fix importlib\_metadata.
content.html:
This is not satisfactory at the moment because this bug in importlib_metadata means it does not work with all packages. I don’t think I will change anything about how this PRw works - there is basicaly no other way to do this, so the bug in importlib_metadata would need to be fixed if we want to check versions without importing modules.

At the moment none of the packages we use have this issue, but still. Maybe I will fix the bug in importlib_metadata (which is included in anaconda and en-route to being a standard library module in Python 3.8). In any case let’s not merge this yet.

Edit: pull request submitted to fix importlib_metadata.

content.raw: I’m going to leave this pull request to sit until my fix for importlib\_metadata is in anaconda repos - maybe 2 months.
content.html: I’m going to leave this pull request to sit until my fix for importlib_metadata is in anaconda repos - maybe 2 months.

content.raw:
importlib_metadata has been updated to fix the bug, and the relevant version is in anaconda.

I updated this PR to rely on that version.

This is now ready for testing. It should be a speed boost for startup time of all the labscript suite apps as they will no longer need to import a bunch of unnecessary things just to check versions of things that they *might* import later.

I will deploy to our lab for testing.

content.raw: Testing shows no issues. Will merge Monday June 17th if there are no issues.
content.html: Testing shows no issues. Will merge Monday June 17th if there are no issues.
